name: Todo
description: Simple task list with add, complete, and delete
longDescription: A clean, minimal task manager. Add tasks, mark them complete, and delete them. Tasks persist across sessions via the OS bridge. Organize with categories and set due dates.
author: Matrix OS

name: Notes
longDescription: Lightweight note-taking with instant auto-save. Write markdown, organize with folders, and search across all notes. Your notes persist automatically.
author: Matrix OS

name: Expense Tracker
longDescription: Monitor your spending habits with category-based tracking. Set monthly budgets, log expenses, and view spending breakdowns with charts. Export data as CSV.
author: Matrix OS

name: Pomodoro Timer
longDescription: Boost productivity with the Pomodoro technique. 25-minute focus sessions followed by 5-minute breaks. Customizable intervals. Track completed sessions per day.
author: Matrix OS

name: Code Editor
description: Lightweight code editor with syntax highlighting
longDescription: Write and edit code with syntax highlighting for 20+ languages. Includes line numbers, auto-indent, bracket matching, and a built-in file browser.
author: Matrix OS

name: Browser
longDescription: Browse the web within Matrix OS. Navigate with URL bar, back/forward buttons, and bookmarks. Supports standard web content.
author: Matrix OS

name: Calculator
longDescription: Full-featured calculator with basic and scientific modes. Includes trigonometric functions, logarithms, and calculation history. Keyboard-friendly input.
author: Matrix OS

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Current weather and 5-day forecast with visual charts
longDescription: See real-time weather conditions including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and atmospheric pressure. 5-day forecast with hourly breakdowns and weather icons.
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a weather dashboard app. Show current temperature, conditions, humidity, and wind speed at the top. Below that show a 5-day forecast as cards. Use a clean, modern design with weather icons. Include a search bar to change city. Use the OpenWeatherMap-style layout.

name: Snake
description: Classic snake game with arrow key controls
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a classic snake game. Use arrow keys to control direction. Snake grows when eating food (red dots). Score display at top. Game over on wall or self collision. Green snake on dark background. Include a restart button.

name: Habit Tracker
description: Daily habit tracking with streak visualization
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a habit tracker app. Users can add habits with names. Each habit shows a row of daily checkboxes for the current week. Completed days show green, missed show red. Track current streak count per habit. Clean minimal design. Data persists via OS bridge.

name: Markdown Preview
description: Live markdown editor with side-by-side preview
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a markdown editor with live preview. Split screen: left side is a textarea for markdown input, right side shows rendered HTML. Support headers, bold, italic, links, code blocks, and lists. Auto-update preview on input change.

name: Flashcards
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a flashcard app with spaced repetition. Users create decks with front/back cards. Study mode flips cards on click. Rate difficulty (Easy/Medium/Hard) to schedule review intervals. Track cards due today. Clean card UI with flip animation.

name: Quiz Maker
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a quiz maker app. Two modes: Create (add questions with 4 options, mark correct answer) and Take (answer questions, show score at end). Support multiple quizzes stored by name. Clean card-based UI for each question.

name: Currency Converter
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a currency converter. Two dropdown selectors for source and target currency (USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, SEK, CHF, CAD, AUD). Amount input field. Show converted amount live. Include a swap button to reverse currencies. Clean, centered layout.

name: Budget Planner
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a monthly budget planner. Add income sources and expense categories with planned amounts. Track actual spending vs planned. Show progress bars per category. Summary section with total income, expenses, and remaining. Pie chart for expense breakdown.

name: Tetris
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a Tetris game. Standard 10x20 grid. 7 tetromino pieces with colors. Arrow keys: left/right to move, up to rotate, down for soft drop. Show next piece preview. Score increases with lines cleared. Speed increases with level. Game over when pieces reach top.

name: Memory Match
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a memory card matching game. Grid of face-down cards (4x4 to start). Click to flip cards, match pairs. Track moves count and time. Cards use emoji symbols. Win when all pairs matched. Include difficulty selector (4x4, 6x6). Celebrate with confetti on win.

name: Minesweeper
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build Minesweeper. Grid with hidden mines. Left-click reveals cell (number = adjacent mines). Right-click to flag. Flood-fill for zero cells. Three difficulties: Beginner (9x9, 10 mines), Intermediate (16x16, 40), Expert (30x16, 99). Timer and mine counter display.

author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build the 2048 game. 4x4 grid with numbered tiles. Arrow keys slide all tiles. Same numbers merge on collision. New tile (2 or 4) appears after each move. Score tracks sum of merged values. Win at 2048 tile. Game over when no moves possible. Smooth sliding animations.

name: Workout Timer
description: Interval training timer with custom routines
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a workout interval timer. Create routines with named exercises, work time, and rest time. Play/pause/reset controls. Large countdown display. Audio beep at transitions. Show current exercise name and upcoming next. Save custom routines.

name: Meditation
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a meditation timer app. Breathing exercise with animated expanding/contracting circle (inhale 4s, hold 4s, exhale 4s). Session timer (5, 10, 15, 20 min). Ambient background. Session history tracking. Soothing minimal design with dark theme.

name: JSON Formatter
description: Format, validate, and explore JSON data
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a JSON formatter tool. Paste JSON in left panel, see formatted/indented output in right panel. Validate JSON and show errors with line numbers. Collapsible tree view. Copy formatted output button. Support minify/beautify toggle. Dark code theme.

name: Regex Tester
description: Test and debug regular expressions live
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a regex testing tool. Input field for regex pattern with flags (g, i, m). Test string textarea below. Highlight all matches in the test string. Show match groups in a table. Include a cheat sheet sidebar with common patterns. Real-time matching on input.

name: Color Picker
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a color picker tool. Color wheel or gradient area for selection. Show HEX, RGB, HSL values with copy buttons. Color history of recent picks. Palette generator (complementary, analogous, triadic). Contrast checker for accessibility (WCAG AA/AAA).

name: Chat Room
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a chat room app. Enter a username to join. Message input at bottom, messages scroll up. Show username, timestamp, and message. Different colors per user. Support /me actions. Persist messages via OS bridge. Clean messaging UI like iMessage.

name: Profile Card
description: Create and share beautiful profile cards
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a profile card creator. Input fields for name, title, bio, avatar URL, and social links (GitHub, Twitter, website). Live preview of a styled card. Multiple themes (light, dark, gradient). Export as image or share link. Clean modern card design.

name: Music Player
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a music player. Load audio files or paste URLs. Play/pause, skip, seek bar, volume control. Playlist with drag-to-reorder. Show track name, artist, and album art placeholder. Repeat and shuffle modes. Minimal dark UI with accent color.

name: Drum Machine
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a drum machine with step sequencer. 4 drum sounds (kick, snare, hi-hat, clap) as rows. 16-step grid where clicking toggles beats. Play/stop/tempo controls. BPM slider (60-180). Visual playback indicator sweeping across steps. Web Audio API for sounds.

name: Pixel Art Studio
description: Draw pixel art on a grid canvas
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a pixel art editor. Grid canvas (16x16 default, selectable 8x8 to 32x32). Color palette with custom color picker. Pencil, eraser, fill bucket tools. Undo/redo. Export as PNG. Grid toggle. Clean toolbar on left, canvas centered. Zoom in/out.

name: Photo Filters
description: Apply filters and adjustments to images
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a photo filter app. Upload an image or use a sample. Apply CSS-based filters: brightness, contrast, saturation, blur, sepia, grayscale, hue-rotate. Slider controls for each. Before/after comparison mode. Download filtered image. Preset filter combos.

name: News Reader
description: RSS feed reader with clean layout
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build an RSS feed reader. Add feed URLs to subscribe. Show articles in a list with title, source, date, and snippet. Click to read full article in a reading pane. Mark as read/unread. Category grouping. Clean typography optimized for reading.

name: Word Guess
description: Daily word guessing game like Wordle
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a Wordle-style word guessing game. 5-letter words, 6 attempts. Keyboard at bottom shows used letters. Green = correct position, yellow = wrong position, gray = not in word. New random word each game. Track win streak. Share results as text grid.

name: Movie Tracker
description: Track watched movies and create watchlists
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a movie tracker. Add movies with title, year, genre, and personal rating (1-5 stars). Watchlist for movies to watch. Watched list with date seen. Search and filter by genre. Statistics: total watched, average rating, favorite genre. Card layout with poster placeholder.

name: Podcast Notes
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a podcast notes app. Paste a podcast audio URL. Audio player with play/pause and seek. Add notes with auto-timestamp. Click a note to jump to that time. Export notes as markdown. Clean split layout: player top, notes below.

name: Recipe Book
description: Store and organize your favorite recipes
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a recipe book app. Add recipes with name, ingredients list, step-by-step instructions, prep time, cook time, and servings. Search and filter by tag. Serving size scaler that adjusts ingredient amounts. Category tabs (breakfast, lunch, dinner, dessert). Clean card layout.

name: Plant Care
description: Track watering and care for your plants
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a plant care tracker. Add plants with name, species, and watering schedule (days between watering). Show which plants need water today with visual indicators. Log watering events. Plant health notes. Card layout with plant emoji and color-coded status (green=happy, yellow=thirsty, red=overdue).

name: Kanban Board
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a kanban board. Three default columns: To Do, In Progress, Done. Add cards with title and description. Drag cards between columns. Color labels for priority (red=urgent, yellow=medium, green=low). Add new columns. Card counter per column. Persist via OS bridge.

name: Journal
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a daily journal app. Date picker to navigate entries. Rich text area for writing. Mood selector (5 emoji faces). Optional tags per entry. Calendar view showing days with entries (highlighted). Search across all entries. Word count display. Export as markdown.

name: API Tester
description: Test REST APIs with request builder
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a REST API tester like a minimal Postman. Method selector (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE). URL input. Headers key-value editor. Body editor (JSON). Send button. Response panel showing status code, headers, and body with syntax highlighting. Request history sidebar.

name: Chess
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a chess game. Standard 8x8 board with piece icons. Click to select piece, click destination to move. Highlight valid moves. Basic AI opponent using minimax (depth 3). Capture tracking on sides. Check/checkmate detection. Move history in algebraic notation.

name: Countdown
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a countdown timer app. Add events with name and target date/time. Show live countdown (days, hours, minutes, seconds). Multiple countdowns in a grid. Color-coded urgency (green=far, yellow=soon, red=today). Past events show 'Completed'. Confetti when countdown reaches zero.

name: Unit Converter
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a unit converter. Categories: Length, Weight, Temperature, Volume, Speed, Time. Dropdown for source and target unit. Input field with instant conversion. Show formula used. Swap button. Recent conversions history. Clean, centered layout.

name: Whiteboard
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a whiteboard app. Infinite canvas with pan and zoom. Drawing tools: pencil (freehand), line, rectangle, ellipse, text. Color picker and stroke width. Eraser tool. Undo/redo. Export as PNG. Touch support for mobile. Toolbar floating on left side.

name: Typing Speed
description: Test and improve your typing speed
author: Matrix OS
prompt: Build a typing speed test. Random paragraph displayed. User types in input below. Real-time WPM and accuracy tracking. Color-code correct (green) and incorrect (red) characters. 30s, 60s, 120s duration options. Results screen with WPM, accuracy, and character breakdown. Leaderboard of personal bests.
